languages.text: Don't forget to restart your shields when they are down. Try to find an ideal manoeuvre for this, however, because on the next turn after the restart, your voidship's speed and firing range will be limited, which may leave it critically vulnerable.
languages.original_text: Не забывайте выполнять перезагрузку щитов. Для этого важно правильно выбрать момент, ведь на следующем ходу после перезагрузки скорость и дальнобойность корабля будут снижены, что может сделать его беззащитным.

traits.locale_text: Don't forget to restart your shields when they are down. Try to find an ideal manoeuvre for this, however, because during the restart, the remaining shields reset to zero and your voidship becomes completely defenceless.

Don't forget to restart your shields when they are down. Try to find an ideal manoeuvre for this, however, because during the restart, the remaining shields reset to zero and your voidship becomes completely defenceless.

Don't forget to restart your shields when they are down. Try to find an ideal manoeuvre for this, however, because on the next turn after the restart, your voidship's speed and firing range will be limited, which may leave it critically vulnerable.

languages.text: No olvides reiniciar tus escudos cuando caigan. Eso sí, intenta encontrar una maniobra ideal para ello, porque, durante al turno siguiente la velocidad y el alcance de tu nave del vacío estarán muy limitados, lo que podría dejarla expuesta en un momento crítico.
languages.original_text: Don't forget to restart your shields when they are down. Try to find an ideal manoeuvre for this, however, because on the next turn after the restart, your voidship's speed and firing range will be limited, which may leave it critically vulnerable.

traits.locale_text: No olvides reiniciar tus escudos cuando caigan. Eso sí, intenta encontrar una maniobra ideal para ello, porque, durante la recarga, los escudos restantes caen a cero y tu nave del vacío queda totalmente indefensa.

languages.text: 如果护盾即将失效的话，别忘了重启护盾。不过在重启护盾时，请务必寻找合适的时机。因为重启护盾之后，您的虚空舰在下个回合的速度与射程都会受到影响。在这种情况下，您的虚空舰可能会不堪一击。
languages.original_text: Don't forget to restart your shields when they are down. Try to find an ideal manoeuvre for this, however, because on the next turn after the restart, your voidship's speed and firing range will be limited, which may leave it critically vulnerable.

traits.locale_text: 如果护盾即将失效的话，别忘了重启护盾。不过在重启护盾时，一定要找到合适的时机，因为在重启护盾的过程中，虚空舰的剩余护盾会被重置为零，您的战舰将会彻底失去防御能力。

languages.text: シールドがダウンしたら再起動するのを忘れないようにしましょう。ただし、再起動後の次のターンは、ヴォイドシップの速度と射程が制限されるため、致命的な弱点になりかねません。再起動に適した行動を考えましょう。
languages.original_text: Don't forget to restart your shields when they are down. Try to find an ideal manoeuvre for this, however, because on the next turn after the restart, your voidship's speed and firing range will be limited, which may leave it critically vulnerable.

traits.locale_text: シールドがダウンしたら再起動するのを忘れないようにしましょう。ただし、再起動後の次のターンは、ヴォイドシップの速度と射程が制限されるため、致命的な弱点になりかねません。再起動に適した行動を考えましょう。

languages.text: Vergiss nicht, deine Schilde wieder hochzufahren, wenn sie deaktiviert wurden. Versuche jedoch, den Zeitpunkt für dieses Manöver gut abzupassen, denn im nächsten Zug nach der Reaktivierung sind Geschwindigkeit und Feuerreichweite deines Raumschiffs begrenzt, was eine kritische Schwachstelle darstellen könnte.
languages.original_text: Don't forget to restart your shields when they are down. Try to find an ideal manoeuvre for this, however, because on the next turn after the restart, your voidship's speed and firing range will be limited, which may leave it critically vulnerable.

traits.locale_text: Vergiss nicht, deine Schilde wieder hochzufahren, wenn sie ausgefallen sind. Versuche jedoch, ein ideales Manöver dafür zu finden, denn beim Hochfahren werden die verbleibenden Schilde auf null zurückgesetzt und dein Raumschiff wird völlig wehrlos.

languages.text: N'oubliez pas de redémarrer vos boucliers lorsqu'ils sont hors ligne. Essayez de trouver la manœuvre idéale pour cela, mais attention, le tour qui suivra le redémarrage, la vitesse et la portée de votre vaisseau seront limitées, ce qui pourrait vous laisser dans une position vulnérable.
languages.original_text: Don't forget to restart your shields when they are down. Try to find an ideal manoeuvre for this, however, because on the next turn after the restart, your voidship's speed and firing range will be limited, which may leave it critically vulnerable.

traits.locale_text: N'oubliez pas de redémarrer vos boucliers lorsqu'ils sont à l'arrêt. Essayez toutefois de trouver la manœuvre idéale, car pendant le redémarrage, les autres boucliers sont réinitialisés et votre vaisseau spatial est totalement sans défense.

languages.text: Не забывайте выполнять перезагрузку щитов. Для этого важно правильно выбрать момент, ведь на следующем ходу после перезагрузки скорость и дальнобойность корабля будут снижены, что может сделать его беззащитным.
languages.original_text: Don't forget to restart your shields when they are down. Try to find an ideal manoeuvre for this, however, because on the next turn after the restart, your voidship's speed and firing range will be limited, which may leave it critically vulnerable.

traits.locale_text: Не забывайте выполнять перезагрузку щитов. Для этого важно правильно выбрать момент, ведь во время перезагрузки оставшиеся щиты обнуляются, оставляя корабль без защиты.
Не забывайте выполнять перезагрузку щитов. Для этого важно правильно выбрать момент, ведь во время перезагрузки оставшиеся щиты обнуляются, оставляя корабль без защиты.

languages.text: Kalkanların tükendiğinde tekrar başlatmayı unutma. Bunu yapmak için ideal anı seçmeye gayret et çünkü kalkanları tekrar başlattıktan sonraki turda uçsuz geminin hızı ve atış menzili azalır. Bu durum onu ciddi saldırılara karşı savunmasız hâle getirebilir.
languages.original_text: Don't forget to restart your shields when they are down. Try to find an ideal manoeuvre for this, however, because on the next turn after the restart, your voidship's speed and firing range will be limited, which may leave it critically vulnerable.
